homePage.title: Fast & Reliable Air Freight Solutions – KAWO
homePage.subtitle: Your partner for tailored air freight solutions. Our experienced team offers Express On Board Courier (OBC) services, flexible air freight options, and exclusive charter flights – worldwide. With our 24-hour hotline, we're always here to deliver your cargo on time and reliably.

about.title: Your Partner for Efficient Air Freight Solutions
about.text: KAWO is your dependable partner for customized air freight solutions. For over 25 years, we've been providing fast worldwide Express OBC services, flexible air freight, and exclusive charter flights. With us, your shipments arrive on schedule and securely – globally and reliably.

globe.title: Global Presence
globe.text: We ship your cargo worldwide and provide a seamless network for delivery to any location in the world.

time.title: Time-Critical Solutions
time.text: Our Express OBC services and flexible air freight enable fast deliveries without compromising on security.

individual.title: Personalized Consultation
individual.text: Our experienced air freight experts offer tailored advice and solutions for your own specific requirements.

services.title: Air Freight Experts for Your Time-Critical Shipments
services.text: KAWO offers efficient and flexible air freight solutions, including Express On Board Courier (OBC), flexible air freight, and exclusive charter flights. With decades of experience and a global network, we're your reliable partner for demanding transportation needs.

onboard.title: Express OBC – Your Fastest Global Delivery
onboard.subtitle: Our Express OBC services provide you with the fastest possible delivery of your shipments. A personal courier accompanies your cargo on board the flight to deliver it directly to the recipient. Whether it's urgent documents or time-critical goods – at KAWO, we have the solution for your urgent transportation needs.
onboard.link: Learn more about our Express OBC services

flex.title: Flexible Air Freight – Your Tailored Solution
flex.subtitle: At KAWO, we offer individual air freight options to meet your demanding transportation needs. Whether it's partial or full charter, special cargo, or precise deliveries – our flexible air freight solutions adapt to your requirements. Trust our expertise and global network for efficient and reliable air freight.
flex.link: Learn more about our flexible air freight solutions

charter.title: Exclusive Charter Flights – Your Optimal Planning
charter.subtitle: Our exclusive charter flights provide you with complete flexibility and planning for your valuable shipments. Reserve an entire flight exclusively for your cargo – worldwide and on schedule. With KAWO, you'll receive a tailored solution for your specific logistics challenges and a reliable service from start to finish.
charter.link: Learn more about our exclusive charter flights

contactUs.title: CONTACT US
contactUs.subtitle: Our team is available 24/7, 365 days a year.
contactUs.block: Our couriers are ready for you everywhere and anytime.

experts.title: YOUR SPECIALIST IN EMERGENCY LOGISTICS
experts.text: Since 1995, we have specialized in On Board Courier services and would like to introduce our professional service to you on the following pages. With our service, you meet your delivery deadlines and avoid major damages due to production downtimes. We see ourselves as a service provider for forwarding companies and industry. Our customers include well-known companies from the automotive, aviation, and computer industries. Our clients know us as a reliable partner that ensures absolute customer protection. The satisfaction of our partners confirms us, and now we look back on over 25,000 successfully processed On Board Courier shipments that have reached their destination safely and reliably worldwide. Benefit from our many years of experience and know-how. We are always available for your questions through our 24-hour hotline.

areas.title: Diverse Applications of Our Air Freight Solutions
areas.text: Our customized air freight services from KAWO are used in a wide range of industries and areas. Whether it's automotive, aviation, computer industry, or other sectors – we offer solutions that meet your specific requirements.

auto.title: Automotive Industry
auto.subtitle: We support the automotive industry with efficient air freight solutions to deliver parts, components, and prototypes on time. Accelerate your supply chain with our tailored transportation services.

comp.title: Computer and Technology Sector
comp.subtitle: Our expertise in the aviation industry allows us to reliably transport aircraft parts, equipment, and components. Count on KAWO to safely take your cargo into the air.

avia.title: Aviation and Aircraft Construction
avia.subtitle: In the computer and technology sector, we offer customized air freight solutions for sensitive electronic devices, hardware components, and more. Maximize the efficiency of your supply chain with our fast and secure transportation services.

first.title: What is an Express On Board Courier (OBC)?
first.answer: An Express On Board Courier is a personal courier who accompanies your cargo directly on board a flight and delivers it to the recipient immediately, allowing for the fastest possible delivery without intermediate stops.

second.title: What are the benefits of exclusive charter flights?
second.answer: Exclusive charter flights guarantee you complete planning and flexibility for your shipments. A complete flight is reserved exclusively for your cargo to ensure timely deliveries worldwide.

third.title: In which industries does KAWO provide its air freight solutions?
third.answer: KAWO serves a wide range of industries, including the automotive, aviation, computer industry, and many more. Our flexible solutions adapt to the specific requirements of different industries.

fourth.title: How can I contact KAWO if I want to track or book a shipment?
fourth.answer: You can reach our team through our 24-hour hotline. Our dedicated team is available to answer your questions, track shipments, or make bookings.

fifth.title: Why should I choose KAWO as my air freight partner?
fifth.answer: KAWO offers decades of experience, a global network, customized solutions, and dedicated customer service. We are committed to meeting your transportation needs and delivering your cargo safely and on time.
